Name: Bagels & Beans IJdock
Review Text: Probably the best Bagels & Beans in town. Nice friendly staff, tons of tables both inside and out, but the tour de force is the view outside onto the IJ river which runs past the train station. It feels like a little oasis away from the bustle of the city.

Name: Bagels & Beans IJdock

Name: Bagels & Beans IJdock

Name: Bagels & Beans IJdock
Review Text: Great place for breakfast ... if you like bagels and coffee.  Great selection of bagels and toppings, very nice coffee, lovely ambiance and nice views from the windows, friendly staff ... what more can you ask for!

Name: Bagels & Beans IJdock

Name: Bagels & Beans IJdock
Review Text: This place was soo cozy, we didn't really want to leave. I had the tuscany bagel with vegan cream cheese (they had several vegan cream cheeses to choose from) and it was absolutely perfect! I really recommend everyone to go try that one

Name: Bagels & Beans IJdock
Review Text: Fine place to be. Beautiful view. Great food also for vegans.

Name: Bagels & Beans IJdock
Review Text: Everytime I visit Bagels & Beans it feels like coming home, and this branch even takes it to the next level: breathtaking view on Amsterdam North, amazing unique location, excellent friendly customer service and of course delicious healthy food and drinks; I recommend this place to anyone!

Name: Bagels & Beans IJdock

Name: Bagels & Beans IJdock
Review Text: Very nice and clean, great service and staff. Best bagel I've ever had.

Name: Bagels & Beans IJdock
Review Text: Excellent bagels and coffee, and a lovely view of the water.

Name: Bagels & Beans IJdock
Review Text: Love love love this location of this branch. Amazing scenery and you can always find a table. Beautiful interior. Strong WiFi for work. Note that the bagels are not ‚ÄúAmerican‚Äù sized bagels. They‚Äôre quite a bit thinner. Superb service from ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans IJdock
Review Text: This place has a wonderful view, an amazing service and one of the best coffees I have ever had. The decoration and the small details besides the healthy and well presented food makes this place a must if you are ever in Amsterdam. Love it!!

Name: Bagels & Beans IJdock
Review Text: Very good place to have a breakfast. We had a a nice berry juice, bagels with scramble eggs and the coffee was really nice. Also views are amazing

Review Text: Delicious bagels and a beautyful place. Loved the view :).

Name: Bagels & Beans IJdock
Review Text: This location is lovely. The restaurant overlooks the harbor. You can get mesmerized watching the ships heading to and from the North Sea. I ordered the "Healthy Yogurt" it's delicious. You can get a good start here on your way to exploring ‚Ä¶

Review Text:

We have been in Amsterdam for the ASOT 900 and ASOT 950 and at both events we had breakfast at this super nice location.
The service is so great and super kind.

Name: Bagels & Beans IJdock
